Homework assignments, project instructions, lecture notes and handouts will be posted in Canvas. Readings will be denoted by "550" for the _Course Notes: Statistics 550 Advanced Mathematical Statistics_ and by "505" for _A Pair of Primers: Primer on Matrix Analysis and Primer on Linear Statistical Models_. 

# Week 1: Jan 13, 15

__Reading__:  

* Course syllabus and Canvas exploration
